name: Circle Game (PK Practice)
description:
Ever want to practice microPK? Here's a quick and simple game to do exactly that. 

A bunch of circles are set on a plain background, and a simple java script thing sets them to moving about in a pseudo-random manner. 

Your task? Get them to co-operate to form a larger circle of dots on the field of play... exact size is up to you.

Have fun :)

~~~~~

game engine: ct.js
pixel art software: Aseprite
